name: Nyasa Lake Spirit
shortLoreBlurb: Nyasa Lake Spirit is a spirit from Malawi/Tanzania associated with lake malawi, storms. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings. Appeased for safe passage and rains.

description: Nyasa Lake Spirit is a spirit from Malawi/Tanzania associated with lake malawi, storms. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
